REGISTRATION HOTEL & TRAVEL CONFERENCE PROGRAM HANDOUTS AND SURVEY LINKS

JOIN US ON WEDNESDAY, JUNE 19 | 6:00 - 9:00 PM

Club and Hotel Controllers Conference attendees are invited to an evening social of mingling, sharing stories, and lawn bowling hosted by the HFTP Minneapolis/St. Paul Chapter. The cost is $25.00 USD ($35.00 USD event day) which includes drink tickets, appetizers, lawn bowling and one of the most beautiful skyline views of the city. Please RSVP to purchase your entry ticket.

Wednesday, June 19, 2019
Brit's Pub & Eating Establishment
6:00-9:00 pm

Sponsored by: Jonas Club Software and bakertilly

GLOBAL ATTENDEES

An International Attendee Invitation Letter is available to international attendees and may be needed for visa applications. Invite Letter

CONTINUING EDUCATION CREDIT

Earn continuing education by attending the Club and Hotel Controllers Conference. More

CONFERENCE HANDOUTS

Conference handouts will be published as they are received. More

QUESTIONS?

For more information, contact education@hftp.org.
